package com;

public class Employee {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a[]= new int[5];
		a[0]=10;
		a[1]=20;
		a[2]=30;
		a[3]=40;
		a[4]=50;
		for(int i=0;i<a.length;i++) {
			System.out.println(a[i]);
			
		}
		
 int b[]= {2,4,6,8};
 for(int i=0;i<b.length;i++) {
	System.out.println(b[i]);
		 
 }
 int c[]= {100,200};
for(int i:c) {
System.out.print(i);
	 	 
 }
	}
}
